remarks: Show closure of the unique element in ~ cdleme25c .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2013.)
statement:
cdleme24.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme24.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme24.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme24.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme24.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme24.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme24.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme24.f $e |- F = ( ( s .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ s ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme24.n $e |- N = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( F .\/ ( ( R .\/ s ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme25cl.i $e |- I = ( iota_ u e. B A. s e. A ( ( -. s .<_ W /\ -. s .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> u = N ) ) $.
cdleme25cl $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> I e. B ) $.
$d ./\ s u $.
$d .<_ s u $.
$d .\/ s u $.
$d A s u $.
$d B s u $.
$d H s $.
$d K s $.
$d N u $.
$d P s u $.
$d Q s u $.
$d R s u $.
$d U s u $.
$d W s u $.
